name: The Stone Of Life
description:
This game is an adventure game that introduce the player into a world full of monsters that want to destroy humanity. 

The game is based in a live action melee combat and it include magic which are obtained by doing quests. There is the main quest and there are side quests. Not to forget  about  puzzles which are hard to solve in the game. 

There might be some buggs or problems, The game isn't fully finished
